comment.author: 18885703@N00
comment._content: I remember our school dinners arriving in containers like this, by van, at the church hall over the road from the school. (I hated them, and the smell...) -that was at Llanfrechfa, Mon, in the late 60s.

comment.author: 82967752@N00
comment._content:
Dru, this was my Junior school! 

The dinners were cooked off-site and delivered in those big containers. I cannot remember anything like this canteen-style service. We had family-style 8-man dinners and all sat down to eat together until I was well into secondary school.
